comments.text:
Created attachment 522680
Stack Crawl of hang (captured with activity monitor)

version prior to :
Build identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110325 Firefox/4.2a1pre

OS : 10.6.6, Processor 2.66 Ghz Intel Core i7, RAM 4 GB, MacBook Pro

1. have several web pages open (some as apps such as bugzilla as an app) etherpad, synced-in, litmus, and most importantly a wiki page that's being edited
2. let the items time out so that you're no longer connected to them
3. launch a web page through a different application such as an email link
4. when the update minefield appears, update and restart
5. choose leave the page when a dialog should appear to leave the page or stay for the wiki page
6. wait

Expected: Minefield will close all windows, update, and restart
Actual: Minefield will close all windows and hang

Note:
1. crash occured after force quitting
2. Minefield was set to Sync
3. active addons : add-on Compatibility Reporter 0.8.2, Rikaichan Japanese Name Dictionary File, Rikaichan Japanese-English Dictionary File

OS : 10.6.6, Processor 2.66 Ghz Intel Core i7, RAM 4 GB, MacBook Pro

1. have several web pages open (some as apps such as bugzilla as an app) etherpad, synced-in, litmus, and most importantly a wiki page that's being edited
2. let the items time out so that you're no longer connected to them
3. launch a web page through a different application such as an email link
